mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DT_ADDRESS (ADDRESS_NUMBER, ADDRESS_POSTAL, ADDRESS_ADDRESS, ADDRESS_DETAIL) VALUES (ADDRESS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{addressPostal}, #{addressAddress}, #{addressDetail})
mapper.select: SELECT ADDRESS_NUMBER FROM ( SELECT ADDRESS_NUMBER FROM DT_ADDRESS ORDER BY ADDRESS_NUMBER DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DT_HOSPITAL (HOSPITAL_NUMBER, HOSPITAL_CALL, HOSPITAL_NAME, ADDRESS_NUMBER) VALUES (HOSPITAL_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{hospitalCall}, #{hospitalName}, #{addressNumber})
mapper.select: SELECT HOSPITAL_NUMBER FROM ( SELECT HOSPITAL_NUMBER FROM DT_HOSPITAL ORDER BY HOSPITAL_NUMBER DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DT_DOCTOR (DOCTOR_NUMBER, DOCTOR_ID, DOCTOR_PW, DOCTOR_NAME, DOCTOR_PHONE, DOCTOR_LICENSE, DOCTOR_MAJOR, HOSPITAL_NUMBER) VALUES (DOCTOR_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{doctorId}, #{doctorPw}, #{doctorName}, #{doctorPhone}, #{doctorLicense}, #{doctorMajor}, #{hospitalNumber})
mapper.select: SELECT d.doctor_number AS doctorNumber, d.doctor_id AS doctorId, d.doctor_pw AS doctorPw, d.doctor_name AS doctorName, d.doctor_phone AS doctorPhone, d.doctor_license AS doctorLicense, d.doctor_major AS doctorMajor, h.hospital_number AS hospitalNumber, h.hospital_call AS hospitalCall, h.hospital_name AS hospitalName, a.address_number AS addressNumber, a.address_postal AS addressPostal, a.address_address AS addressAddress, a.address_detail AS addressDetail FROM dt_doctor d LEFT JOIN dt_hospital h ON d.hospital_number = h.hospital_number LEFT JOIN dt_address a ON h.address_number = a.address_number WHERE d.doctor_id = #{doctorId} AND d.doctor_pw = #{doctorPw}
